lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Diane Warren
[00:00.180] 作词 : Diane Warren
[00:00.541]They’ll never know just who you are
[00:05.481]But they can’t turn your bright star dark
[00:11.349]They’ll try to hold your spirit down
[00:16.353]Couldn’t do it then, can’t do it now
[00:20.519]They’ll try to tell you who to be
[00:25.152]But they can’t change the way you feel
[00:31.528]Can’t tame a wild heart, you are free  free
[00:43.483]
[00:44.734]Free as the grass that’s right under your feet
[00:49.852]Free as the sky underneath your wings
[00:54.699]Free as the wind and the river flowing to the sea
[01:04.517]Free as the feeling they can’t take from you
[01:09.494]No walls can keep your heart from your dream
[01:14.316]Free is just knowing that you were born to
[01:20.085]To be free, free
[01:34.292]
[01:34.614]They’ll try to tell you where to go
[01:39.409]Try to put chains around your soul
[01:45.384]But they could never hold you back
[01:50.537]Cuz you were built too strong for that
[01:55.663]Can’t tame a wild heart
[01:58.116]
[01:58.973]Free as the grass that’s right under your feet
[02:03.864]Free as the sky underneath your wings
[02:08.783]Free as the wind and the river flowing to the sea
[02:18.711]Free
[02:23.715]
[02:24.086]Oh no-ones ever putting out that fire inside
[02:29.831]Feeling free’s the only way you feel alive
[02:34.881]With the wind at your back, running fast and, Free
[02:40.883]
[02:41.210]Free as the grass that’s right under your feet
[02:45.912]Free as the sky underneath your wings
[02:50.831]Free as the wind and the river flowing to the sea
[03:00.679]Free as the feeling they can’t take from you
[03:05.746]No walls can keep your heart from your dream
[03:10.666]Free is just knowing that you were born to
[03:16.261]To be, free yeah, free yeah, free, free, free
[03:38.651]Oh free
tlyric:
[by:本尼托先生]
[00:00.541]他们永远看不到真正的你
[00:05.481]不会熄灭你闪光的星星
[00:11.349]他们会企图让你泄气
[00:16.353]他们之前不能 现在也一样不可以
[00:20.519]他们想要将你定义
[00:25.152]而不会改变你内心的感情
[00:31.528]无法驯服一颗狂野的心 因为你自由不羁
[00:44.734]自由得如同你脚下的草地
[00:49.852]自由得如同翅膀飞到了天穹之顶
[00:54.699]自由得如同风儿 又如同河流向大海汇聚
[01:04.517]自由得仿佛这感觉无人能夺去
[01:09.494]任何墙壁都不能阻止你把梦想追寻
[01:14.316]自由便是知道自己想要的东西
[01:20.085]那就是变得自由不羁
[01:34.614]他们想为你把方向指明
[01:39.409]想带上枷锁禁锢你的心灵
[01:45.384]而这些并不能将你阻抑
[01:50.537]你生来强大 早已无所畏惧
[01:55.663]无法驯服一颗狂野的心
[01:58.973]自由得如同你脚下的草地
[02:03.864]自由得如同翅膀飞到了天穹之顶
[02:08.783]自由得如同风儿 又如同河流向大海汇聚
[02:18.711]自由不羁
[02:24.086]谁也不能将你心中的火焰灭去
[02:29.831]自由便是你存在的意义
[02:34.881]风儿在你身后飞跑 嬉戏
[02:41.210]自由得如同你脚下的草地
[02:45.912]自由得如同翅膀飞到了天穹之顶
[02:50.831]自由得如同风儿 又如同河流向大海汇聚
[03:00.679]自由得仿佛这感觉无人能夺去
[03:05.746]任何墙壁都不能阻止你把梦想追寻
[03:10.666]自由便是知道自己想要的东西
[03:16.261]那就是变得自由不羁
[03:38.651]自由不羁
